subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Ohio State's Anthony Gonzalez hopes he has a future on the bench. The receiver with legal aspirations is not thinking of the bench of an N.F.L. team, but a court bench. Until then, he's focused on Monday's B.C.S. title game.
